item.title: 扫描 PHP 危险文件脚本
item.description: 上码 Laravel php artisan make:command ScanHorse: <?php namespace App\Console\Commands; define('MYFULLPATH', str_replace('\\', '/', (__FILE__))); use Carbon\Carbon; use Illuminate\Console\Command; class ScanHorse extends Command { /** * The name and signature of the console command. * * @var string */ protected $signature = 'scan_horse'; /** * The console command description. * * @var string */ protected $description = '扫描 PHP 木马'; /** * Create a new command instance. * * @return void */ public function __construct() { parent::__construct(); } public $php_code = array(); public $count = 0; public $scanned = 0; public $ignore = array('.
